settings.custom_liquid:
Two years ago, a handful of prototypes were made of a little card game called Doomlings. We had no idea what it could become until a community of 10,000+ Kickstarter backers made it a reality.

Today, we have a new idea, and weâ€™re returning to our favorite crowdfunding platform to launch it.

Overlush expands the Doomlings universe by introducing all new MYSTERY EXPANSION BOXES. Each box contains 4 packs, and each pack contains an assortment of 14 game cards and 1 guaranteed holofoil from the Overlush set. The best part? There are over 170 new cards to discover in the Overlush collection!

We know a lot of you out there want Doomlings you can squeeze, which is difficult to do with cards without destroying them. Well, get those smooshing hands ready, because PLUSHIES will be the other flagship offering during our campaign!

<style>
[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div {
    min-height: initial !important;
    padding-top: 55px !important;
    background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0554/6190/4593/files/SignUpForAlerts.png?v=1676668555);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: top center;
}

[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div.form-complete {
    padding-top: 0 !important;
    background-image: none;
}

.form-hide {
    display: none !important;
}

[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] [data-testid="form-row"]:nth-child(-n+2) {
    background: white;
}

[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] [data-testid="form-row"]:first-child {
    border-radius: 20px 20px 0 0;
}

[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] [data-testid="form-row"]:last-child {
    border-radius: 0 0 20px 20px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
}

[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] [data-testid="form-row"]:nth-child(3) > div {
    padding-right: 5px !important;
    padding-left: 5px !important;
}

form[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] {
    max-width: 550px !important;
}

[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div button {
    max-width: 300px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

/*** HERO ***/
#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 {
    background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0554/6190/4593/files/TheStranger_Characters.jpg?v=1676669995);
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: bottom center;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 > .container {
    padding-top: 270px;
    padding-bottom: 330px;
    position: relative;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 > .container:before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 650px;
    background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0554/6190/4593/files/Overlush-Logo.png?v=1675290326);
    background-size: 650px;
    height: 206px;
    top: 50px;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 > .container:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 400px;
    background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0554/6190/4593/files/g_Procrastination.png?v=1676668344);
    background-size: 400px;
    height: 339px;
    bottom: -30px;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
}

@media screen and (max-width: 900px) {
    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 > .container {
        padding-top: 215px;
        padding-bottom: 240px;
    }
    
    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 > .container:before {
        width: 450px;
        background-size: 450px;
        height: 143px;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 > .container:after {
        width: 300px;
        background-size: 300px;
        height: 247px;
        bottom: -20px;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 520px) {
    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 {
        background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0554/6190/4593/files/TheStranger_Characters-M.jpg?v=1676669995);
        background-position: top center;
        position: relative;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 > .container:before,
    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 > .container:after {
        display: none;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__1676659104e958eec9 > .container {
        padding-top: 120vw;
        padding-bottom: 30px;
    }

    [data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div {
        padding-top: 35px !important;
        background-size: 280px;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 420px) {
    [data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div button {
        max-width: initial;
    }
}

/*** CONTENT ***/
.lp-img-head-center {
    text-align: center;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__4d72db0f-aa63-4851-b56b-0c654bafbfe2 {
    background: rgb(28,23,78);
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(104deg, rgba(28,23,78,1) 0%, rgba(59,50,142,1) 100%);
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(104deg, rgba(28,23,78,1) 0%, rgba(59,50,142,1) 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(104deg, rgba(28,23,78,1) 0%, rgba(59,50,142,1) 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr="#1c174e",endColorstr="#3b328e",GradientType=1);
}

.lp-text-center {
    text-align: center;
}

p {
    color: white !important;
}

#MainContent > section[id^="shopify-section-template"]:not(:first-child):not(:last-child) > .container {
    padding-top: 70px;
    padding-bottom: 70px;
}

.lp-two-column {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 1em;
}

[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div button,
button.lp-form-cta {
    background: #DB3CD5 !important;
    border: 4px solid white;
    border-radius: 17px !important;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    box-shadow: none;
    font-weight: 400 !important;
    cursor: pointer !important;
}

[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div button:hover,
[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div button:active,
[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div button:focus,
button.lp-form-cta:hover,
button.lp-form-cta:active,
button.lp-form-cta:focus {
    background: #50248f !important;
    color: white;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 616px) {
    .lp-mb-only {
        display: none;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 615px) {
    .lp-dt-only {
        display: none;
    }
}

/*** KICKSTARTER ***/
#MainContent > section#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__4d72db0f-aa63-4851-b56b-0c654bafbfe2 .container {
    padding-bottom: 20px;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__4d72db0f-aa63-4851-b56b-0c654bafbfe2 .page-width {
    max-width: 715px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__4d72db0f-aa63-4851-b56b-0c654bafbfe2 .lp-column-1 {
    min-width: 336px;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__4d72db0f-aa63-4851-b56b-0c654bafbfe2 .lp-column-2 {
    flex-shrink: 1;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 615px) {
    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__4d72db0f-aa63-4851-b56b-0c654bafbfe2 .lp-two-column {
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        gap: initial;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__4d72db0f-aa63-4851-b56b-0c654bafbfe2 .lp-text-center {
        text-align: left;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 400px) {
    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__4d72db0f-aa63-4851-b56b-0c654bafbfe2 .lp-column-1 {
        min-width: initial;
    }   
}

/*** MYSTERY ***/
#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b {
    background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0554/6190/4593/files/spaceBG.png?v=1676678272);
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: right center;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b .page-width {
    max-width: 1050px;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b [class^="lp-column"] {
    width: 50%;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b [class^="lp-column"] p {
    margin-top: 0;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 615px) {
    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b {
        background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0554/6190/4593/files/AgeofDoubtBG.png?v=1676679969);
        background-position: center;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b .lp-two-column {
        flex-wrap: wrap;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b [class^="lp-column"] {
        width: 100%;
        text-align: center;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b [class^="lp-column"] p {
        text-align: left;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b .lp-column-2 {
        margin-top: 150px;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__27bdbcb2-de49-4787-9a31-e450e4251c0b .lp-column-2 img {
        margin-bottom: 25px;
    }
}

/*** PLUSHIES ***/
#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 {
    background: rgb(28,167,223);
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(28,167,223,1) 0%, rgba(124,218,255,1) 100%);
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(28,167,223,1) 0%, rgba(124,218,255,1) 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(28,167,223,1) 0%, rgba(124,218,255,1) 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr="#1ca7df",endColorstr="#7cdaff",GradientType=1);
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 .page-width {
    max-width: 1050px;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 .lp-two-column {
    justify-content: space-between;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 .lp-column-1 {
    width: 32%;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 .lp-column-2 {
    width: 60%;
}

#shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 [class^="lp-column"] p {
    margin-top: 0;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 615px) {
    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 .lp-two-column {
        flex-wrap: wrap;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 .lp-column-1 {
        order: 2;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 [class^="lp-column"] p {
        text-align: left;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 [class^="lp-column"] {
        width: 100%;
        text-align: center;
    }

    #shopify-section-template--15700834451665__e6011e9b-b83b-4cd5-912d-94ad957f8120 button.lp-mb-only {
        margin-top: 50px;
    }
}
</style>

<script>
(() => {
    //console.log('script init');
    const formText = '[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] [data-testid="form-row"]:nth-child(-n+2)';
    let loaded = setInterval(() => {
        //console.log('interval init', `formText.lengh = ${formText.length}`);
        if ( document.querySelectorAll(formText).length ) {
            //console.log('found form text');
            clearInterval(loaded);
            const textEls = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll(formText));

            textEls.forEach((el) => {
                el.classList.add('form-hide');
            });

            window.addEventListener("klaviyoForms", function(e) { 
                if (e.detail.type == 'submit') {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        document.querySelector('[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"] > div').classList.add('form-complete');
                        textEls.forEach((el) => {
                            el.classList.remove('form-hide');
                        });
                    }, 500);
                    
                }
            });
        }

        document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if ( !e.target.matches('button.lp-form-cta') ) return;
        
            const form = document.querySelector('form[data-testid="klaviyo-form-Wmgkjh"]');
            form.scrollIntoView({behavior: "smooth", block: "center", inline: "nearest"});
        });
    }, 100);
})();
</script>
